text: Controls: Up Arrow for Up. Down Arrow for Down. Left Arrow for Left. Right Arrow for Right. Z for Shoot.

Story: Aditya's main enemies are Adixetior  & Abyss Aditya. Abyss Aditya's main enemies are Aditya and Abyss Adixetior. We know enemy's enemy are friends. So for that Adixetior's Team attacked at Abyss Adixetior for being a friend of Aditya. And, you  have to save him. Can you?
